1.content:
So, who might your character be?
You can play anyone from Ponyville, including background characters.
You can also decide whether they are older or not, also deciding whether others will be older.
And, ofcourse, you may make up your own character. Can be a pony, ( keep it earth, pegasus and unicorns ), and

So, who're you going to play as?

11.title: Spike, The Dragon

choices: ''Searching for an Apple Picker, come to Sweet Apple Acres today!''
111.content:
You're Spike, and you're your own original size, still as cheery as ever. However, lately you've run out of tasty gems to eat, so you've been wanting those for weeks now. You're in Twillight's Library again, trying to get Twillight to buy you some gems, without any succes, though.

''But, Twillight..'' you whine, but quickly got interrupted by Twillight. ''Sorry Spike, but I can't get you gems everyday, I don't have enough bits right now, okay?'' Twillight said. ''Then how am I gonna get some gems?'' you mumble. ''Well, if you want those gems so badly, why don't you go look for some work, I'm sure somepony could use some help.'' Twillight replies. Yeah.. yeah! That would be the solution to your problems, maybe if you worked hard enough, you could probably even get a Sappy Sapphire, those things are delicious. ''All right, Twillight! I'll be off trying to help somebody!'' you say, as you run off. ''Don't hurt yourself!'' you hear Twillight say from the distance. ''I'm good, Twillight.'' You say as you slam the door behind you. You suddenly heard the sound of books flying and falling everywhere, with a frustrated Twillight screaming; ''Spike!'' after the noise. Better get outta here.

You looked around Ponyville to see if somebody needed some help with something, but no succes. You walk down the road, kicking a stone around when you notice a dashboard with all kinds of notices on it. A certain one catches your eye..

1111.content:
Apple picking doesn't sound so bad. You look at the advertisement somewhat better. ''Looking for Apple Picker in Sweet Apple Acres, 10 bits a day, no restriction to certain ponies whatsoever.'' 10 bits? That's sweet! You run off to Sweet Apple Acres and hope that they still have somebody they need.

You came to Sweet Apple Acres, and you knock on the farm's door. You hear somepony coming down the stairs, and opens the door. You notice Applejack standing in the door. ''Oh, hey there Spike! Are you here for Twillight, er' sumthin'?'' Applejack asks. ''Uh, no.. I'm here because you had a job for Apple Picker?'' you say. ''Oh, err.. do ya have Twillight's permission for that? 'Cause I mean..'' You nod. ''Well, all right then, Spike. You can go help..''

11111.content:
''..Big Macintosh.'' she said. ''All right, I'll be on it.'' you say, as you run off. ''Wrong direction', Spike!'' you hear Applejack scream. You stop, and just walk back again. ''Oh, uh.. heh heh.. I knew that.'' you say, as you walked past her again. Applejack facehooves and mumbles. ''Don't screw it up like last times you tried to help, will ya?'' she mumbles. ''What?'' you ask. ''Nothing.'' Applejack said as she rolled her eyes.

You ran off to the nearest apple field, and you notice Big Macintosh in the field. ''Hey, Big Macintosh.'' you say. You notice Big Macintosh looking up, noticing you. ''Oh hey there lil' fella.'' you hear Big Macintosh say to your surprise. No ''eeyup'' like usual? That's.. strange. ''Uh.. wow, since when are you so talkative?'' you say. ''Oh, err.. eeyup..'' Big Macintosh said.

Okay, that was weird. Oh well. You started picking fruit, and tried to work as hard as possible. You climb into the trees to pick some apples, or to catch all the apples Big Macintosh bucks from the trees. Although a little slow, you did a decent job on it. However, you seem to notice that Big Macintosh is looking this way a lot. It makes you feel like you're doing something wrong. ''Uhm.. Big Macintosh..?'' you say. ''Uh.. wha now?'' Big Macintosh asks. ''You're looking this way all the time, am I doing something wrong?'' you ask. ''Oh, err.. sorry, lil' fella, ya distract me a lot.. I mean.. no, ya're doing a great job, Spikeyb-- err..'' Big Macintosh mumbled. You frown. ''Well, eh.. all right, then..'' you say, as you continued picking fruit. He did seem to be a little distracted. You climb the tree again, and you suddenly slipped and you're starting to fall down, were this trees always this high, by the way?! You suddenly heard galloping. You look to the other side and notice Big Macintosh charging this way, and notice he takes a leap, catching you on his back. You catch your breath again due to being scared off the long drop, and you look at Big Macintosh. ''Th-thanks, Big Macintosh..'' you say, as you lean forward to ''hug'' Big Macintosh. ''No problem, lil' fella..'' Big Macintosh said. You let go of him, and dropped of Big Macintosh's back. ''By the way, Spike. Why are ya doing this job, anyway?'' Big Macintosh asked. ''Well, I ran out of gems to eat, so Twillight gave me the idea to get a job and earn them myself. Why, actually?'' you ask. ''Oh, err.. out o' sheer interest, lil' fella.'' Big Macintosh said. You nod.

You both went back to work until sunset, both chatting and picking apples. ''Oh, looks like it's getting late, lil' fella. Go get ya're reward from my little sister, I'll finish up.'' he says. ''All right, see you tommorow!'' you say. ''Er, Spike, we only needed somepony today. The advertisement showed that, right? One whole week, and today was the last day. '''What..? Oh..'' you said. Well, that seriously sucks.. you seriously liked being around Big Macintosh. You just walked away to get your reward again. You knock on the door of the Sweet Apple Acres farm, and yet again, Applejack opens up. ''Oh, heya there, Spike! What's with the frown?'' Applejack asked. ''Oh, yeah.. I'm kinda sad because I didn't read the advertisement too well, and noticed this is the last day.. and I kinda liked working here with Big Macintosh.'' you say. ''Oh, but Spike, you can always visit us again anytime, ya'hear? Here's ya're 10 bits.'' Applejack said, and handed you the bits. ''Yeah.. thanks..'' you say, as you wandered back home.

You came into Twillight's Library again, and she happily greeted you. ''Hey, Spike. How did it go? Did you get some bits?'' Twillight asked. ''Yeah..'' you say, as you just walked off again. ''Is there something wrong, Spike?'' Twillight asks. ''..nothing..'' you say, as you wander off upstairs to go into your ''bed''. ''Poor Spike.. I wish I knew what was bothering him.''

You soon notice it's Thunderlane. Blushing, as you were practically holding hands. This interactive makes you play one of the citiziens of Equestria, and make them get sexual with other characters.
You can be anything you want, just keep it in the ''My Little Pony'' Style.

The Rules are as followed:
Straight and Gay allowed.
The size can't be TOO different.
Any sex allowed, except watersports, scat and other kinds of ''hitting-fetishes'' like SM. You can be a little gross, as long as there are no feces or anything like that.

Be creative!

YOU MUST USE PROPER GRAMMAR, IF IT'S NOT READABLE BECAUSE OF WAY TOO MUCH GRAMMAR MISTAKES, I WILL DELETE IT.

Other than that, have fun, be creative, and don't hold back.
